description:
The 'iscsi_use_multipath' parameter indicates whether to use multipathing in iscsi. For some reason it's default value was set to false, which produces reduced performance. 

This parameter was added in https://review.openstack.org/#/c/17946/
title: multipathing for iscsi should be enabled by default

comments.content:
The 'iscsi_use_multipath' parameter indicates whether to use multipathing in iscsi. For some reason it's default value was set to false, which produces reduced performance.

comments.content: I disagree with this bug.  It should only be enabled if the multipath daemon is installed and running.
